channel.title: 7 on Dr. Daniel S. Quintana
channel.description: Recent content in 7 on Dr. Daniel S. Quintana

item.title: Bayesian alternatives for common null-hypothesis significance tests in psychiatry: A non-technical guide using JASP

item.title: Evidence for intranasal oxytocin delivery to the brain: recent advances and future perspectives

item.title: Oxytocin gene networks in the human brain: A gene expression and large-scale fMRI meta-analysis study
item.description: Full citation Quintana, D. S., Rokicki, J., van der Meer, D., Alnæs, D., Kaufmann, T., Palomera, A. C., … & Westlye, L. T. Genetic networks of the oxytocin system in the human brain: A gene expression and large-scale fMRI meta-analysis study, Biorxiv, https://doi.org/10.1101/149526

item.title: Reduced heart rate variability in a treatment-seeking early psychosis sample

item.title: Water consumption as a source of error in the measurement of heart rate variability

item.title: Diurnal Variation and Twenty-four Hour Sleep Deprivation do not Alter Supine Heart Rate Variability in Healthy Male Young Adults
item.description: Full citation Quintana, D.S., Elvsåshagen, T., Zak, N., Norbom L.B., Pedersen, P.Ø., Quraishi, S.H., Bjørnerud, A., Malt, U.F., Groote, I.R., Kaufmann, T., Andreassen, O.A., Westlye, L.T. (2017). Diurnal Variation and Twenty-four Hour Sleep Deprivation do not Alter Supine Heart Rate Variability in Healthy Male Young Adults. PLOS ONE. 12(2): e0170921, DOI:10.1371/journal.pone.017092
